alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 10:59AM CDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Recent heavy rainfall is resulting in significant rises on the Wabash River. The river is forecast to begin flooding tonight, then crest at New Harmony next weekend. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Harmonie State Park is closed. Surrounding bottomland is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 19.1 feet Saturday April 1. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
